entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
